page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Denbigh's main areas of{employment are public services, e.g.{North Wales {Hospital}and commercial premises in the town centre.The{industrial estate provides skilled and unskilled job opportunities in a variety of light industries. The unemployment trend is rising although seasonal factors bring about a fluctuation in statistics. The unemployment rate is{13.4%}.Of those unemployed{712}are men and{446 are women. Opportunities for employment are not encouraging especially with the general lack of industrial growth nationwide and in nearby industrial areas such as Deeside,which once provided many{job {opportunities.}Many feel they are in a desperate situation and are having to endure the many hardships that unemployment brings.
